seed_pair.target: It's important to take time to test yourself.
seed_pair.known: Es importante tomar tiempo para evaluarte.

S0060: todavía | no sé | todavía no sé | cómo decir | suficientes palabras diferentes
yet/still | I don't know | I still don't know | how to say | enough different words
S0061: podrías decir | decir eso | otra vez | un poco más | más lentamente | un poco más lentamente
could you say | say that | again | a little more | more slowly | a little more slowly
S0062: no estoy seguro | si puedo ayudarte | puedo ayudarte | ayudarte | al mismo tiempo
I'm not sure | if I can help you | I can help you | help you | at the same time
S0063: estás seguro | estás seguro de que | no te importa | te importa ayudarme | ayudarme
are you sure | are you sure that | you don't mind | mind helping me | help me
S0064: aprender español | no es fácil | pero | es divertido
learning Spanish | isn't easy | but | it is fun

practice_phrases: I think it's important to practise
It's important to be able to speak
It's important to take time to improve
es importante tomar tiempo para mejorar
I know it's important to learn as much as I can
sé que es importante aprender tan duro como pueda
She wanted to tell me that it's important to practise speaking Spanish
quería decir que es importante practicar hablar español
I need to take time to think
To take time to answer carefully
I don't like taking too much time to respond
no me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder
She wants to take time to improve her Spanish
quiere tomar tiempo para mejorar su español
I think it's important to take time to practise every day
pienso que es importante tomar tiempo para practicar todo el día
It's a good thing to take time to test yourself when learning Spanish
es una cosa buena tomar tiempo para evaluarte cuando aprendiendo español
I need time to test myself
To test yourself when you learn
It's useful to test yourself often
It's important to take time to test yourself
es importante tomar tiempo para evaluarte
I think to test yourself is a good thing
pienso que evaluarte es una cosa buena
She told me it's important to test yourself every week
quería decir es importante evaluarte la próxima semana

quiero tomar tiempo para evaluarte cuando aprendiendo español
You need to test yourself more often
